title.gco:CharacterString: Global Map: Railroad Stations of the United States, 2014

organisationName.gco:CharacterString: National Atlas of the United States
National Atlas of the United States

otherCitationDetails.gco:CharacterString: These data were downloaded from the National Atlas website (http://www.nationalatlas.gov/atlasftp.html) in August 2014.

collectiveTitle.gco:CharacterString: National Atlas of the United States of America, 1997-2014

abstract.gco:CharacterString: This point shapefile includes Global Map data showing Amtrak intercity railroad terminals in the United States. The data are a modified version of the National Atlas of the United States data set of railroad and bus passenger stations of the United States; those source data are a subset of data available from the Research and Innovative Technology Administration, Bureau of Transportation Statistics (RITA/BTS). There are no Amtrak stations in Alaska or Hawaii.

purpose.gco:CharacterString: Global Map data are part of a cooperative effort among national mapping organizations around the world to produce and maintain a standard set of basic cartographic data that supports global investigations of natural and human-built environments. Participating nations prepare data using a common data structure and description to ensure compatibility and to tangibly promote the tenets of the Global Spatial Data Infrastructure. These data are intended for geographic display and analysis at the national level, and for large regional areas. The data should be displayed and analyzed at scales appropriate for 1:1,000,000-scale data. No responsibility is assumed by the National Atlas of the United States in the use of these data.

credit.gco:CharacterString: National Atlas of the United States. (2014). Global Map: Railroad Stations of the United States, 2014. National Atlas of the United States. Available at: http://purl.stanford.edu/qs632bn9594.

organisationName.gco:CharacterString: National Atlas of the United States

useLimitation.gco:CharacterString: Although these data have been processed successfully on a computer system at the U.S. Geological Survey, no warranty expressed or implied is made by the U.S. Geological Survey regarding the utility of the data on any other system, nor shall the act of distribution constitute any such warranty. No responsibility is assumed by the U.S. Geological Survey in the use of these data.

title.gco:CharacterString: National Atlas of the United States of America, 1997-2014

environmentDescription.gco:CharacterString: Microsoft Windows 7 Version 6.1 (Build 7601) Service Pack 1; Esri ArcGIS 10.3.1.4959

title.gco:CharacterString: Feature catalog for Global Map: Railroad Stations of the United States, 2014

evaluationMethodDescription.gco:CharacterString: The map layer was checked for topological consistency using ArcGIS. No other checks for logical consistency were performed on this map layer.

measureDescription.gco:CharacterString: The map layer was checked for topological consistency using ArcGIS. No other checks for logical consistency were performed on this map layer.
The map layer includes Amtrak railroad stations. Regional commuter railroad stations that are not also served by Amtrak are not included.

description.gco:CharacterString: The Amtrak Stations point shapefile was downloaded from the National Transportation Atlas Database CD-ROM. The shapefile was projected to geographic coordinates. Stations with a status of closed, future, or future/bus were deleted. Questions were resolved through online searches for additional information, and minor edits were performed.

All the 1:1,000,000-scale map layers were checked for vertical integration. Line positions were adjusted as necessary to remove overlaps. Wherever possible, linear features were separated by 300 meters, but were kept within 500 meters of their true location.

The National Atlas 1M Amtrak data set file name was changed to reflect the Global Map file-naming convention. Bus stations were removed. Existing attributes were deleted except those required by Global Map, and the attribute field names were modified to reflect the Global Map conventions. The attributes f_code and soc were added and populated with the appropriate values. The data were checked using the Global Map Data Checker.

title.gco:CharacterString: National Transportation Atlas Database 2007 - Amtrak Stations

organisationName.gco:CharacterString: Research and Innovative Technology Administration, Bureau of Transportation Statistics (RITA/BTS)
Research and Innovative Technology Administration, Bureau of Transportation Statistics (RITA/BTS)

otherCitationDetails.gco:CharacterString: Numerous sources were used to compile complete station information for this map layer, including the Center for Transportation Analysis Rail Network, Wikipedia, ESRI Online Streets, and other online map sources. More information is available from the National Atlas contacts listed elsewhere in this metadata.

title.gco:CharacterString: Railroad and Bus Passenger Stations of the United States

otherCitationDetails.gco:CharacterString: Numerous sources were used to perform quality-control and vertical integration, including all the 1:1,000,000-scale National Atlas map layers, a variety of online sources, and online USGS topographic maps. More information is available from the National Atlas contacts listed elsewhere in this metadata.
